description: JSON schema for a qblox schedulable.

name.description: A unique name of this schedulable.

operation_id.description: string representation of the operation in the operation dict.

rel_time.description: relative time between the reference operation and this operation.

ref_schedulable.description: The label of the reference schedulable.

ref_pt.description: reference point in reference operation must be one of ('start', 'center', 'end').

ref_pt_new.description: reference point in added operation must be one of ('start', 'center', 'end').

control_flow.description: Reference to a control flow Operation.
